fields.title: Senior Recruiter
fields.notes:
* Degree in civil or structural engineering
* E.I.T. highly preferred
* 3-5 years experience with structural calculations, shop drawings, and design drawings
* Experience with working on commercial/government/industrial projects
* Experience with design softwares
* Excellent problem solving skills
* Good communication skills and a team player

If you have your EIT and are looking to work under a P.E., this is the perfect opportunity. We are looking to mentor and teach someone who is a quick learner and wants to work.
